author: Fortune
title: Ground News - 'Gnarly' waves up to 40-feet tall are pummeling West Coast beaches and causing flooding: 'They're huge'
text:
Summary by Fortune Forecasters urged people to stay off rocks and jetties, and to not turn their backs to the ocean because of the danger of “sneaker waves.” Share menu More
